title: 06/07/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 06/07/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses the Clippers advancing to the second round of the playoffs and why this isn’t very impressive for a team with championship aspirations. He explains why the Nets don’t meet the criteria for a typical championship team despite having so much success so far in the playoffs. He also tells you why he was right about Julio Jones and wrong about the Lakers. Plus, NBA Champion Stephen Jackson joins the show to analyze what the Clippers did to turn it around in their series against the Mavericks.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
